translation.en: [Shrek] "Once upon a time there was a lovely princess.
translation.ja: 遠い昔 遥かな国に 美しいプリンセスがいました

translation.en: But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort,
translation.ja: だが恐ろしいのろいを かけられていて

translation.en: which could only be broken by love's first kiss.
translation.ja: 呪いを解くのは 恋人のキスだけ

translation.en: She was locked away in a castle, guarded by a terrible fire-breathing dragon.
translation.ja: 彼女は火を吹くドラゴンが守る 城に捕らわれていました

translation.en: Many brave knights had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison,
translation.ja: 大勢の騎士が 助け出そうとしたが

translation.en: but none prevailed.
translation.ja: 誰も成功しませんでした

translation.en: She waited in the dragon's keep, in the highest room of the tallest tower,
translation.ja: プリンセスは高い塔の てっぺんで待ち続けています

translation.en: for her true love and true love's first kiss."
translation.ja: “運命の人”が キスを与えてくれる日を

translation.en: [laughing] Like that's ever gonna happen.
translation.ja: おとぎ話じゃあるまいし

translation.en: -[paper rustling and toilet flushes] -what a load of--
translation.ja: くっせえの！

translation.en: ♪ That's the way I like it And I'll never get bored ♪
translation.ja: “怪物に注意”

translation.en: ♪ Hey, now You're an all-star ♪
translation.ja: “賞金付き”

translation.en: ♪ Get your game on, go play ♪
translation.ja: “入るな”

translation.en: -Think it's in there? -All right. Let's get it!
translation.ja: あれが住み家だ とっ捕まえようぜ！

translation.en: Whoa. Hold on. Do you know what that thing can do to you?
translation.ja: 待て ヤバい相手だぜ

translation.en: Yeah, it'll grind your bones for its bread.
translation.ja: 骨を粉にして パンにするって話だ

translation.en: [laughs] Yes, well, actually, that would be a giant.
translation.ja: それは別の国の巨人だろ？

translation.en: [gasps] Now, ogres, they're much worse.
translation.ja: オレたちは もっと凄いんだぜ

translation.en: They'll make a suit from your freshly peeled skin.
translation.ja: お前らの皮をはいで 服を作り

translation.en: -No! -They'll shave your liver. Squeeze the jelly from your eyes!
translation.ja: 臓物をスライス 目玉を潰してジャムにする

translation.en: -Actually, it's quite good on toast. -Back! Back, beast!
translation.ja: チョーうま！ 下がれ！

translation.en: Back! I warn ya!
translation.ja: 下がれ！ 近づくな！

translation.en: [gasping] Right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: [whispers] This is the part where you run away.
translation.ja: ここでお前らが 逃げるシーンだよ

translation.en: And stay out!
translation.ja: 二度と来るなよ！

translation.en: "Wanted. Fairy tale creatures."
translation.ja: “おとぎ話のキャラに賞金”？

translation.en: [man's voice] All right. This one's full.
translation.ja: 満パイだ 運んでけ！

translation.en: -Take it away! -[gasps]
translation.ja: 満パイだ 運んでけ！ ハイホー ハイホー

translation.en: -Move it along. Come on! Get up! -Next!
translation.ja: ハイホー ハイホー オレたち囚人

translation.en: Give me that! Your flying days are over.
translation.ja: 没収だ！ もう飛べんぞ！

translation.en: That's 20 pieces of silver for the witch. Next!
translation.ja: 魔女の賞金は銀貨20枚 次！

translation.en: -Get up! Come on! -Twenty pieces.
translation.ja: たった銀貨20枚？

translation.en: This cage is too small.
translation.ja: この檻 小さすぎるよォ

translation.en: Please don't turn me in. I'll never be stubborn again. I can change. Please! Give me another chance!
translation.ja: もう強情張らないから 売らないで

translation.en: -Oh, shut up. Oh! -[man] Next!
translation.ja: お黙り！ 次！

translation.en: -What have you got? -This little wooden puppet.
translation.ja: 木の人形です

translation.en: I'm not a puppet. I'm a real boy.
translation.ja: 人形じゃない 本物の子供だよォ

translation.en: Five shillings for the possessed toy.
translation.ja: ウソつき人形か ５シリング！

translation.en: -Take it away. Father, please! -Don't let them do this!
translation.ja: ウソつき人形か ５シリング！ やめて 助けて！

translation.en: -Help me! -Next. What have you got?
translation.ja: 次は何だ？

translation.en: -Well, I've got a talking donkey. -[grunts]
translation.ja: 言葉をしゃべるロバです

translation.en: Right. Well, that's good for ten shillings, if you can prove it.
translation.ja: なるほど 証明してみろ 10シリングやろう

translation.en: Oh, go ahead, little fella.
translation.ja: さあ しゃべるんだよ

translation.en: Well?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: Oh, oh, he's just-- He's just a little nervous.
translation.ja: ちょっと上がってるみたいで…

translation.en: He's really quite a chatterbox. Talk, you boneheaded dolt--
translation.ja: ちょっと上がってるみたいで… しゃべるのよ！

translation.en: -That's it. I've heard enough. Guards! -[lady] No, no, he talks!
translation.ja: もういい 警備兵！ 本当に話すんです

translation.en: He does. I can talk. I love to talk.
translation.ja: 本当に話すんです オレは おしゃべり大好き！ “おしゃべりロバ”

translation.en: I'm the talkingest damn thing you ever saw.
translation.ja: オレは おしゃべり大好き！ “おしゃべりロバ”

translation.en: -Get her out of my sight. -No, no!
translation.ja: 追っ払え！

translation.en: I swear! Oh! He can talk!
translation.ja: 本当なのよ！ 放して！ お願い！

translation.en: Hey! I can fly!
translation.ja: 飛んでる！

translation.en: He can fly! He can fly!
translation.ja: すごい！ 飛んでる！

translation.en: -He can talk! -Ha, ha! That's right, fool!
translation.ja: 話せるぞ！ そうさ！ 空飛ぶ おしゃべり ロバ フライング･ドンキーだ！

translation.en: Now I'm a flying, talking donkey.
translation.ja: そうさ！ 空飛ぶ おしゃべり ロバ フライング･ドンキーだ！

translation.en: You might have seen a house fly, maybe even a super fly,
translation.ja: そうさ！ 空飛ぶ おしゃべり ロバ フライング･ドンキーだ！ 空飛ぶゾウよりカッコいい！ すっげえクールだろ！

translation.en: but I bet you ain't never seen a donkey fly.
translation.ja: 空飛ぶゾウよりカッコいい！ すっげえクールだろ！

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.ja: おっとぉ…

translation.en: Seize him!
translation.ja: 捕えろ！

translation.en: [man] After him! He's getting away!
translation.ja: 追え！

translation.en: You there. Ogre!
translation.ja: おい！ そこの怪物！

translation.en: By the order of Lord Farquaad, I am authorized to place you both under arrest,
translation.ja: ファークアード卿の命により お前ら両名を逮捕して

translation.en: and transport you to a designated... resettlement facility.
translation.ja: これより指定された 収容施設へ連行する

translation.en: Oh, really? You and what army?
translation.ja: へえ 本当に？ １人でやれるの？

translation.en: Can I say something to you?
translation.ja: スゲェ！

translation.en: Listen, you was really, really somethin' back there. Incredible!
translation.ja: タダもんじゃないね あんた！

translation.en: Are you talkin' to-- me? Whoa!
translation.ja: オレに言ってんのか？ お前… もち そうさ

translation.en: Yes, I was talkin' to you. Can I tell you that you was great back there?
translation.ja: もち そうさ すげぇクールだった

translation.en: Those guards!
translation.ja: すげぇクールだった

translation.en: They thought they was all of that. Then you showed up, and bam!
translation.ja: さっきのガン飛ばし！

translation.en: They was trippin' over themselves like babes in the woods. That really made me feel good to see that.
translation.ja: 連中 お手てつないで 逃げちまった

translation.en: -Oh, that's great. Really. -Man, it's good to be free.
translation.ja: そりゃ何より 晴れて自由の身だ！

translation.en: Now, why don't you go celebrate your freedom with your own friends? Hmm?
translation.ja: なら お仲間んとこ行って 自由を祝いな

translation.en: But, uh, I don't have any friends.
translation.ja: と言われても 仲間いね～し

translation.en: And I'm not goin' out there by myself.
translation.ja: １人で戻るなんて御免だ

translation.en: Hey, wait a minute! I got a great idea! I'll stick with you.
translation.ja: そうだ あんたについてくよ！

translation.en: You're a mean, green, fightin' machine. Together we'll scare the spit out of anybody that crosses us.
translation.ja: 緑の大魔人と一緒なら 渡る世間に敵はなしだ！

translation.en: Oh, wow! That was really scary.
translation.ja: お～コワ

translation.en: [Donkey] If you don't mind me sayin', if that don't work, your breath certainly will get the job done,
translation.ja: あんたの息で 誰だってイチコロ！

translation.en: 'cause you definitely need some Tic Tacs or something, 'cause your breath stinks!
translation.ja: マジで歯磨きしてないっしょ！

translation.en: You almost burned the hair outta my nose, just like the time-- [mumbling]
translation.ja: 鼻毛も枯れちまうぜ

translation.en: Then I ate some rotten berries. I had strong gases eking out of my butt that day.
translation.ja: イモ食った後の 屁よりも強烈

translation.en: Why are you following me?
translation.ja: なんで ついて来るんだ？

translation.en: I'll tell you why.
translation.ja: なんでかって？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm all alone ♪
translation.ja: “オレは孤独な奴さ”

translation.en: ♪ There's no one here beside me ♪
translation.ja: “オレのそばには 誰もいない”

translation.en: ♪ My problems have all gone ♪
translation.ja: “話し合える仲間が 欲しいのに独り”

translation.en: ♪ There's no one to deride me ♪
translation.ja: “話し合える仲間が 欲しいのに独り” “仲良くしようよ”

translation.en: ♪ But you gotta have friends ♪
translation.ja: “友達が欲しい”

translation.en: Stop singing!
translation.ja: やめろ！ 歌うな！

translation.en: Well, It's no wonder you don't have any friends.
translation.ja: 友達がいないわけだ！

translation.en: Wow. Only a true friend would be that truly honest.
translation.ja: 率直なご意見！ 真の友達だ！

translation.en: Listen, little donkey. Take a look at me. What am I?
translation.ja: いいか おしゃべりロバ オレ様をよ～く見ろ！

translation.en: -Really tall? -No! I'm an ogre.
translation.ja: デカい？ 違う！ 泣く子も黙る怪物だ

translation.en: You know. "Grab your torch and pitchforks."
translation.ja: 違う！ 泣く子も黙る怪物だ 皆は こう言う “怪物を退治しろ！”

translation.en: Doesn't that bother you?
translation.ja: 怖いだろ？

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -Nope.
translation.ja: ちっとも

translation.en: -Really? -Really, really.
translation.ja: 本当に？ ホントにホント

translation.en: -Oh. -Man, I like you. What's your name?
translation.ja: 気に入った 名前は？

translation.en: Uh, Shrek.
translation.ja: シュレック

translation.en: Shrek? Well, you know what I like about you, Shrek?
translation.ja: シュレック？ 気に入ったぜ

translation.en: You got that kind of I-don't-care-what- nobody-thinks-of-me thing.
translation.ja: “誰がどう思おうと オレはオレ”ってとこ

translation.en: I like that. I respect that, Shrek. You all right.
translation.ja: めちゃクール！

translation.en: Whoo! Look at that. Who'd want to live in a place like that?
translation.ja: ひでぇ家！ 住む奴の顔が見たいぜ

translation.en: That would be my home.
translation.ja: もう たっぷり見てるさ

translation.en: Oh! And it is lovely! Just beautiful.
translation.ja: いい家！ おっしゃれ～

translation.en: You know, you are quite a decorator. It's amazing what you've done with such a modest budget.
translation.ja: 金はないけど センスで勝負したって感じ！

translation.en: I like that boulder. That is a nice boulder.
translation.ja: この石が利いてる お目が高い！

translation.en: I guess you don't entertain much, do you?
translation.ja: あんた 人嫌いでしょ？

translation.en: I like my privacy.
translation.ja: 煩わしいのはイヤなんだ

translation.en: You know, I do too. That's another thing we have in common.
translation.ja: 分かるよ！ オレもそう

translation.en: Like, I hate it when you got somebody in your face. You're trying to give them a hint, and they won't leave.
translation.ja: 付きまとう奴ってヤだもんね

translation.en: There's that awkward silence, you know.
translation.ja: 話題切れの気まずい沈黙

translation.en: -Can I stay with you? -Uh, what?
translation.ja: ね 泊めて 何？

translation.en: Can I stay with you, please?
translation.ja: ここに泊めて お願い！

translation.en: -Of course! -Really?
translation.ja: もちろん！

translation.en: -No. -Please! I don't wanna go back there!
translation.ja: ダメ！ もう あそこには 戻りたくない！

translation.en: You don't know what it's like to be considered a freak. Well, maybe you do.
translation.ja: もう あそこには 戻りたくない！ 分かってくれるでしょ？

translation.en: But that's why we gotta stick together. You gotta let me stay!
translation.ja: だから一緒にいさせて

translation.en: Please! Please! Okay! Okay!
translation.ja: お願い！ よせ 分かったよ

translation.en: -But one night only. -Ah! Thank you!
translation.ja: 一晩だけだ よせ！

translation.en: -What are you-- No! No! -This is gonna be fun!
translation.ja: よせ！ 今夜は一晩中 語り合おう

translation.en: We can stay up late, swappin' manly stories,
translation.ja: 今夜は一晩中 語り合おう

translation.en: and in the mornin' I'm makin' waffles.
translation.ja: で 朝メシは オレが作ったげる

translation.en: -Oh! -Where do, uh, I sleep?
translation.ja: オレ どこに寝んの？

translation.en: Outside!
translation.ja: 外だよ！

translation.en: Oh, well, I guess that's cool. I mean, I don't know you, and you don't know me, so I guess outside is best, you know.
translation.ja: そりゃそうか 赤の他人だし 最初の夜は外だよな

translation.en: [sniffles] Here I go.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: Good night. [sighs]
translation.ja: おやすみ

translation.en: [Donkey] I mean, I do like the outdoors. I'm a donkey. I was born outside.
translation.ja: オレはロバ アウト･ドア派だもん

translation.en: I'll just be sitting by myself outside, I guess, you know. By myself, outside.
translation.ja: 独りぼっちで外で寝よう 独りぼっちでね

translation.en: ♪ I'm all alone There's no one here beside me ♪
translation.ja: “どうってことない” “いつでも独りぼっち”

translation.en: [sighs] I thought I told you to stay outside.
translation.ja: 外にいろったら！

translation.en: -[Donkey] i am outside. -[clattering]
translation.ja: いるって！

translation.en: Well, gents, it's a far cry from the farm, but what choice do we have?
translation.ja: 農家の食事とは わびしい

translation.en: It's not home, but it'll do just fine.
translation.ja: 仕方ない 我慢しよう

translation.en: What a lovely bed.
translation.ja: ベッドだ！ こいつ！

translation.en: -Got ya. [sniffs] -I found some cheese.
translation.ja: チーズだ！

translation.en: -Ow! [grunts] -Blah! Awful stuff.
translation.ja: 臭い！ 腐ってる

translation.en: -Is that you, Gorder? -How did you know?
translation.ja: ゴードンか？ 分かる？

translation.en: Enough! What are you doing in my house?
translation.ja: そこまで！ ここは オレの家だ！

translation.en: [grunts] Hey!
translation.ja: おい！

translation.en: -[snickers] -Oh, no, no, no. Dead broad off the table.
translation.ja: 死んだお姉ちゃんを 乗せんなって！

translation.en: Where are we supposed to put her? The bed's taken.
translation.ja: でもベッドには先客が…

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だよ

translation.en: I live in a swamp. I put up signs. I'm a terrifying ogre!
translation.ja: オレはこの沼の 泣く子も黙る怪物だぞ！

translation.en: What do I have to do to get a little privacy?
translation.ja: 怪物にだってプライバシーが あるんだ！ 出てけ！

translation.en: -Aah! -Oh, no.
translation.ja: ウソだろ！

translation.en: -No! No! -[cackling]
translation.ja: お前ら何やってる？

translation.en: What are you doing in my swamp?
translation.ja: とにかく 全員出てってくれ！

translation.en: All right, get out of here. All of you, move it!
translation.ja: ほら早く さっさと！

translation.en: Come on! Let's go! Hapaya! Hapaya! Hey!
translation.ja: グズグズすんな！ 行った 行った！

translation.en: No, no. Not there. Not there.
translation.ja: 中には入るな！

translation.en: Hey, don't look at me. I didn't invite them.
translation.ja: オレのせいじゃ…

translation.en: Oh, gosh, no one invited us.
translation.ja: “ここに住め”って

translation.en: -What? -We were forced to come here.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 命令なんだ

translation.en: -By who? -Lord Farquaad.
translation.ja: 誰の？ ファークアード卿さ

translation.en: He huffed und he puffed und he... signed an eviction notice.
translation.ja: ボクたちを追い出す 追放命令を出したんだ

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Who knows where this Farquaad guy is?
translation.ja: そのファークアードとか いう野郎は どこに？

translation.en: -[murmuring] Oh, I do. -I know where he is.
translation.ja: はい は～い！

translation.en: Does anyone else know where to find him?
translation.ja: 他に居場所を 知ってる者は？

translation.en: -Anyone at all? -Me! Me!
translation.ja: 誰か？ はい オレ オレ！

translation.en: -Anyone? -Oh! Oh, pick me! Oh, I know! I know! Me, me!
translation.ja: オレにして！ オレ 知ってる！

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, fine.
translation.ja: よし 仕方ない

translation.en: Attention, all fairy tale things.
translation.ja: 皆 よく聞け おとぎ話のキャラたち！ ここに住む事は出来ない！

translation.en: Do not get comfortable. Your welcome is officially worn out.
translation.ja: おとぎ話のキャラたち！ ここに住む事は出来ない！ お前たちは 招かれざる客なんだ

translation.en: In fact, I'm gonna see this guy Farquaad right now
translation.ja: オレがそのファークアードに 掛け合って

translation.en: and get you all off my land and back where you came from!
translation.ja: お前らを 元の場所に返してやる

translation.en: Oh! You!
translation.ja: お前

translation.en: You're comin' with me.
translation.ja: 一緒に来い

translation.en: All right, that's what I like to hear, man.
translation.ja: そう来なくっちゃ！

translation.en: Shrek and Donkey, two stalwart friends, off on a whirlwind big-city adventure. I love it!
translation.ja: シュレックとドンキーのペア 大アドベンチャーに出発！

translation.en: ♪ On the road again ♪
translation.ja: “出発だ！”

translation.en: Sing it with me Shrek.
translation.ja: 歌おうよ

translation.en: ♪ I can't wait to get On the road again ♪
translation.ja: “大冒険に出発だ！”

translation.en: What did I say about singing?
translation.ja: 歌うなと言ったろ？

translation.en: -Can I whistle? -No.
translation.ja: 口笛は？

translation.en: -Can I hum it? -All right, hum it.
translation.ja: じゃ鼻歌は？ 分かったよ

translation.en: That's enough. He's ready to talk.
translation.ja: そこまで！ 口を割れ！

translation.en: Run, run, run, as fast as you can.
translation.ja: “僕を捕まえられる？”

translation.en: You can't catch me. I'm the gingerbread man!
translation.ja: “駿足の僕は 捕まらない”と言うつもりか！

translation.en: -You're a monster. -I'm not the monster here. You are.
translation.ja: モンスターめ！ それは お前らだ！

translation.en: You and the rest of that fairy tale trash, poisoning my perfect world.
translation.ja: パーフェクトな王国を害する おとぎ話のキャラども！

translation.en: Now, tell me! Where are the others?
translation.ja: 仲間はどこだ？

translation.en: -Eat me! -[grunts]
translation.ja: 喰らえ！

translation.en: I've tried to be fair to you creatures.
translation.ja: 私が お前らに寛大すぎたのだ いい気になりおって！

translation.en: Now my patience has reached its end! Tell me or I'll--
translation.ja: 私が お前らに寛大すぎたのだ いい気になりおって！ 吐け！

translation.en: No, no, not the buttons. Not my gumdrop buttons.
translation.ja: これ以上 僕を壊さないで！

translation.en: All right then. Who's hiding them?
translation.ja: じゃ仲間は誰だ？

translation.en: Okay, I'll tell you. Do you know the muffin man?
translation.ja: 分かった 話すよ ヒントは僕の名前だよ

translation.en: -The muffin man? -The muffin man.
translation.ja: クッキーマン？ そうクッキーマン

translation.en: Yes, I know the muffin man, who lives on Drury Lane?
translation.ja: じゃビスケットマンもいるな？

translation.en: Well, she's married to the muffin man.
translation.ja: ほかにも まだまだいるよ

translation.en: -The muffin man? -The muffin man!
translation.ja: 本当か？ 本当だよ

translation.en: -She's married to the muffin man. -[door opens]
translation.ja: じゃケーキマンも？

translation.en: My lord! We found it.
translation.ja: 見つけました！

translation.en: Then what are you waiting for? Bring it in.
translation.ja: でかした！ 持って来い！

translation.en: -Magic mirror-- -Don't tell him anything!
translation.ja: 魔法の鏡… 何もしゃべるな！

translation.en: -[gingerbread man whimpers] -Evening.
translation.ja: 今晩は

translation.en: Mirror, mirror, on the wall. Is this not the most perfect kingdom of them all?
translation.ja: 鏡よ 鏡 私の王国は 世界一パーフェクトだろ？

translation.en: Well, technically you're not a king.
translation.ja: まず あんたは王じゃない

translation.en: Uh, Thelonius.
translation.ja: セロニアス

translation.en: -You were saying? -What I mean is, you're not a king yet.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 今は まだ 王じゃない

translation.en: But you can become one. All you have to do is marry a princess.

translation.en: Uh, what's the matter with you? You got something in your eye?
translation.ja: 目に何か入った？

translation.en: Man, I'd really love to stay, but, you know, I'm, uh-- [coughs]
translation.ja: デートしたいけど

translation.en: I'm an asthmatic, and I don't know if it'd work out if you're gonna blow smoke rings and stuff.
translation.ja: ぜん息の気があって 煙にヨワいんだよ

translation.en: Shrek! [gasps]
translation.ja: シュレック！

translation.en: [whimpering] No! Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!
translation.ja: シュレック！ 助けてェ～！

translation.en: -Wake up! -What?
translation.ja: 起きろ

translation.en: Are you Princess Fiona?
translation.ja: フィオナ姫かい？

translation.en: I am, awaiting a knight so bold as to rescue me.
translation.ja: そうよ 騎士の助けを待ってるの

translation.en: Oh, that's nice. Now let's go!
translation.ja: そうか じゃ 行こう

translation.en: But wait, Sir Knight.
translation.ja: 待って 騎士殿！

translation.en: This be-ith our first meeting.
translation.ja: 最初の出会いなのよ

translation.en: Should it not be a wonderful, romantic moment?
translation.ja: ロマンチックな 一瞬のはずでは？

translation.en: -Yeah, sorry, lady. There's no time. -Hey, wait. What are you doing?
translation.ja: 悪いが時間がないんだよ 待ってよ！

translation.en: You should sweep me off my feet,
translation.ja: 私を抱き上げて

translation.en: out yonder window and down a rope onto your valiant steed.
translation.ja: 窓から下で待つ白馬の背に

translation.en: You've had a lot of time to plan this, haven't you?
translation.ja: それが あんたの筋書き？

translation.en: But we have to savour this moment! You could recite an epic poem for me.
translation.ja: 詩を朗読するとか もっと ムードを出してくれなきゃ

translation.en: A ballad? A sonnet!
translation.ja: バラードかソネット

translation.en: -A limerick? Or something! -I don't think so.
translation.ja: 甘く優しい恋の歌を！ 遠慮しとく

translation.en: Well, can I at least know the name of my champion?
translation.ja: せめて勇敢な騎士殿の お名前を

translation.en: Um, Shrek.
translation.ja: シュレック

translation.en: Sir Shrek. [clears throat]
translation.ja: シュレック卿

translation.en: I pray that you take this favour as a token of my gratitude.
translation.ja: 私の感謝のしるしとして お受け取り下さい

translation.en: Thanks!
translation.ja: すまんね

translation.en: You didn't slay the dragon?
translation.ja: まだ退治してないの？

translation.en: -It's on my to-do list. Now come on! -[screams]
translation.ja: 殺しそこなってね

translation.en: [Fiona] But this isn't right!
translation.ja: 全然 筋書きと違うわ！

translation.en: You were meant to charge in, sword drawn, banner flying. That's what all the other knights did.
translation.ja: 他の騎士たちは剣をかざし 戦おうとしたわ！

translation.en: [Shrek] Yeah, right before they burst into flame.
translation.ja: そして焼き殺された

translation.en: That's not the point. Oh!
translation.ja: たまたまね！

translation.en: Wait. Where are you going? The exit's over there.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 出口は あっちよ

translation.en: Well, I have to save my ass.
translation.ja: 逃げるが勝ちだよ

translation.en: What kind of knight are you?
translation.ja: あなたって どういう騎士？

translation.en: One of a kind.
translation.ja: 今に分かるよ

translation.en: Just call me old-fashioned, you know. [laughs]
translation.ja: チョイ待ち そう焦るなって…

translation.en: I don't want to rush into a physical relationship.
translation.ja: チョイ待ち そう焦るなって… オレ そういう深い関係は 心の準備ができてなくて…

translation.en: I'm not emotionally ready for a commitment of, uh, this, uh--
translation.ja: オレ そういう深い関係は 心の準備ができてなくて…

translation.en: Magnitude really is the word I'm looking for.
translation.ja: サイズ的にも不安だ

translation.en: Magnitude--Hey, that is unwanted physical contact.
translation.ja: 分かるでしょ？ ちょっと！ もうセクハラ！

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 何すんの？

translation.en: Okay, okay. Let's just back up a little and take this one step at a time.
translation.ja: 待って 冷静に手順踏もうよ

translation.en: We really should get to know each other first as friends or pen pals.
translation.ja: まずは友達として ペン･フレンドは どう？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm on the road a lot, but I just love receiving cards--
translation.ja: 絵葉書をもらうの大好き！

translation.en: Hey, you know I'd really love to stay, but--
translation.ja: 本当は君とゆっくり…

translation.en: Hey, hey! Don't do that! That's my tail! That's my personal tail.
translation.ja: 大事な尻尾に触るな！

translation.en: You're gonna tear it off. I don't give permission-- What are you gonna do with that?
translation.ja: 尻尾を引き抜こうなんて 思うなよ

translation.en: Hey, now. No way. No! No!
translation.ja: やめろ 何してんだよ やめてェ！

translation.en: No, no! No. No, no, no! No! Oh!
translation.ja: やめてェ！

translation.en: -Hi, Princess! -It talks!
translation.ja: どうも！ 話せるの？

translation.en: Yeah, it's getting him to shut up that's the trick.
translation.ja: おしゃべり野郎でね！

translation.en: Okay, you two, head for the exit!
translation.ja: お前らは先に逃げろ

translation.en: I'll take care of the dragon.
translation.ja: あとは引き受けた

translation.en: [echoing] Run!
translation.ja: 逃げろ～ォォォ！

translation.en: -[dragon growling in the distance] -You did it!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: You rescued me! You're amazing. You're--
translation.ja: 恩人だわ！ 何て勇敢なの！ ステキ！

translation.en: You're wonderful. You're...
translation.ja: 何て勇敢なの！ ステキ！

translation.en: a little unorthodox I'll admit.
translation.ja: ちょっと型破りだけど

translation.en: But thy deed is great, and thine heart is pure.
translation.ja: ちょっと型破りだけど そなたの勇気と 汚れなきハート

translation.en: -I am eternally in your debt. -[clears throat]
translation.ja: ご恩は忘れませぬ

translation.en: And where would a brave knight be without his noble steed?
translation.ja: 気高き白馬の働きも 見事でした

translation.en: I hope you heard that. She called me a noble steed. She thinks I'm a steed.
translation.ja: ワォ！ 今の聞いた？ オレの ことを“気高き白馬”だとさ

translation.en: [Fiona laughs] The battle is won. You may remove your helmet, good Sir Knight.
translation.ja: 勝利は我々のもの 甲を お取り下さい

translation.en: -Uh, no. -Why not?
translation.ja: やめておく なぜ？

translation.en: I have helmet hair.
translation.ja: 寝癖がついているし

translation.en: Please. I would'st look upon the face of my rescuer.
translation.ja: お顔を見せてたてまつれ

translation.en: No, no, you wouldn't-- 'st.
translation.ja: ダメ たてまつれぬ

translation.en: But how will you kiss me?
translation.ja: ではキスできないわ

translation.en: What? That wasn't in the job description.
translation.ja: キス？ 仕事の契約にはない

translation.en: Maybe it's a perk.
translation.ja: ボーナスだよ

translation.en: No, it's destiny. Oh, you must know how it goes.
translation.ja: いいえ 運命なのよ 知ってるはずよ

translation.en: A princess locked in a tower and beset by a dragon...
translation.ja: 勇敢な騎士が 塔に幽閉されている プリンセスを助け出して

translation.en: is rescued by a brave knight,
translation.ja: 塔に幽閉されている プリンセスを助け出して

translation.en: and then they share true love's first kiss.
translation.ja: “運命の人”として キスするお話

translation.en: Hmm? With Shrek? You think-- Wait.
translation.ja: シュレックと？

translation.en: Wait. You think that Shrek is your true love?
translation.ja: シュレックが“運命の人”？

translation.en: Well, yes.
translation.ja: ええ…そうよ

translation.en: You think Shrek is your true love!
translation.ja: シュレックが“運命の人”？

translation.en: What is so funny?
translation.ja: 何が おかしいの？

translation.en: Let's just say I'm not your type, okay?
translation.ja: オレは君のタイプじゃない

translation.en: Of course, you are. You're my rescuer.
translation.ja: もちろんタイプよ 恩人ですもの

translation.en: Now-- Now remove your helmet.
translation.ja: お願い 甲を取って

translation.en: Look. I really don't think this is a good idea.
translation.ja: そいつはマズいんだよ

translation.en: -Just take off the helmet. -I'm not going to.
translation.ja: 取って イヤだ

translation.en: -Take it off. -No!
translation.ja: 取って 取りなさい！

translation.en: -Now! -Okay!
translation.ja: 分かったよ どなるな

translation.en: Easy. As you command, Your Highness.
translation.ja: 分かったよ どなるな 仰せの通りに プリンセス

translation.en: You-- You're a-- an ogre.
translation.ja: あなたは…怪物？

translation.en: Oh, you were expecting Prince Charming.
translation.ja: 王子様じゃなくて残念

translation.en: Well, yes, actually.
translation.ja: そうね…たしかに…

translation.en: Oh, no. This is all wrong. You're not supposed to be an ogre.
translation.ja: 思ってた筋書きと違うわ 命の恩人が怪物だなんて

translation.en: [sighs] Princess, I was sent to rescue you by Lord Farquaad, okay?
translation.ja: オレはファークアード卿の 命令で助けに来た

translation.en: He's the one who wants to marry you.
translation.ja: 結婚相手は彼だ

translation.en: Then why didn't he come rescue me?
translation.ja: 彼は来ないの？

translation.en: Good question. You should ask him that when we get there.
translation.ja: いい質問だ 本人に聞けよ

translation.en: But I have to be rescued by my true love,
translation.ja: “運命の人”が来ないで

translation.en: not by some ogre and his-- his pet.
translation.ja: その代わりが怪物とペット？

translation.en: Well, so much for noble steed.
translation.ja: “気高き白馬”にあんまりだ

translation.en: Look princess, you're not making my job any easier.
translation.ja: これが オレの仕事でね

translation.en: I'm sorry, but your job is not my problem.
translation.ja: 私には関係ないことよ

translation.en: You can tell Lord Farquaad that if he wants to rescue me properly,
translation.ja: そのファークアード卿に 私を助けに来てと伝えて

translation.en: I'll be waiting for him right here.
translation.ja: 私は ここで待つわ

translation.en: Hey! I'm no one's messenger boy, all right? I'm a delivery boy.
translation.ja: オレに伝言を運べだと？ オレは荷物の運び屋だ

translation.en: You wouldn't dare.
translation.ja: 手を出す気？

translation.en: -[shrieks] Put me down! -Ya comin', Donkey?
translation.ja: 行こうぜ

translation.en: I'm right behind ya.
translation.ja: ついてくよ

translation.en: Put me down, or you will suffer the consequences!
translation.ja: 降ろして！ 痛い目に遭うわよ！

translation.en: This is not dignified! Put me down! [screams]
translation.ja: みっともない！ 降ろして！

translation.en: [Donkey] Okay, so here's another question.
translation.ja: じゃ この場合は？

translation.en: Say there's a woman that digs you, right, but you don't really like her that way.
translation.ja: 女の方は オレにゾッコン

translation.en: How do you let her down real easy so her feelings aren't hurt, but you don't get burned to a crisp and eaten? How you do that?
translation.ja: だが邪険に断わると 焼かれて食われちまう

translation.en: You just tell her she's not your true love. Everyone knowest what happens when you find your--
translation.ja: “本当の恋じゃない”と優しく 言うのよ そうすれば…

translation.en: The sooner we get to DuLoc the better.
translation.ja: 早く そのデュロックへ

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna love it there, Princess. It's beautiful!
translation.ja: 美しくて いい国だぜ

translation.en: And what of my groom-to-be? Lord Farquaad? What's he like?
translation.ja: お相手のファークアード様って どんな方？

translation.en: Well, Let me put it this way, Princess.
translation.ja: こう言っておこう

translation.en: Men of Farquaad's stature are in short supply.
translation.ja: “男としては” “とっても「詰まった」ヤツ”

translation.en: I don't know. There are those who think little of him.
translation.ja: アイツって アレだよ 低く見られがち？

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it, both of you.
translation.ja: やめなさい ２人とも

translation.en: You're just jealous you can never measure up to a great ruler like Lord Farquaad.
translation.ja: ファークアード卿と差が ありすぎて くやしいのね

translation.en: Yeah, well, maybe you're right, Princess.
translation.ja: いいとこ ついてるかも

translation.en: But I'll let you do the "measuring" when you see him tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 会ったら 差を比べてみな

translation.en: Tomorrow? It'll take that long?
translation.ja: 明日？ そんなに遠いの？

translation.en: -Shouldn't we stop to make camp? -No, that'll take longer.
translation.ja: 野宿を ますます到着が遅れる

translation.en: -We can keep going. -But there's robbers in the woods.
translation.ja: 急ごう 森には盗賊が出るのよ

translation.en: Whoa! Time out, Shrek! Camping's starting to sound good.
translation.ja: やっぱ野宿がいいな シュレック

translation.en: Hey, come on. I'm scarier than anything we're going to see in this forest.
translation.ja: オレを見たら 向こうが逃げてくさ

translation.en: I need to find somewhere to camp now!
translation.ja: 野宿の場所を探して！

translation.en: -Hey! Over here. -Shrek, we can do better than that.
translation.ja: ここがいい こんなホラ穴？

translation.en: I don't think this is fit for a princess.
translation.ja: プリンセスに失礼だよ

translation.en: No, no, it's perfect. It just needs a few homey touches.
translation.ja: 女性の感性でアレンジを

translation.en: -Homey touches? Like what? -[crashing]
translation.ja: 女性の感性？ どんな？

translation.en: A door? Well, gentlemen, I bid thee good night.
translation.ja: ドアよ じゃあね おやすみ！

translation.en: You want me to read you a bedtime story? I will.
translation.ja: オレが おとぎ話でも

translation.en: [Fiona] I said good night!
translation.ja: おやすみ！

translation.en: Shrek, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 何すんだよ？

translation.en: [laughs] I just-- You know-- Oh, come on.
translation.ja: その… ただのおふざけだよ

translation.en: I was just kidding.
translation.ja: ただのおふざけだよ

translation.en: [Shrek] And, uh, that one, that's Throwback,
translation.ja: あそこに見えるのが スローバック座

translation.en: the only ogre to ever spit over three wheat fields.
translation.ja: 唾を数十メートル 飛ばした伝説の怪物だ

translation.en: Right. Yeah.
translation.ja: 本当に？ すごい

translation.en: Hey, can you tell my future from these stars?
translation.ja: 星で将来が分かる？

translation.en: The stars don't tell the future, Donkey. They tell stories.
translation.ja: いや 星が 教えてくれるのは物語さ

translation.en: Look, there's Bloodnut, the Flatulent.
translation.ja: あれは屁の ブラッドナット座

translation.en: -You can guess what he's famous for. -I know you're making this up.
translation.ja: 特技は想像つくだろ？ デタラメだろう？

translation.en: No, look. There he is,
translation.ja: 本当さ よく見ろ

translation.en: and there's the group of hunters running away from his stench.
translation.ja: 臭いので星が逃げてく

translation.en: That ain't nothin' but a bunch of little dots.
translation.ja: ただの光る点だな

translation.en: You know Donkey, sometimes things are more than they appear.
translation.ja: 物事 見かけだけで 判断してはいけない

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.ja: 忘れてくれ

translation.en: Hey, Shrek, what we gonna do when we get our swamp anyway?
translation.ja: オレたちの沼が戻ったら？

translation.en: Our swamp?
translation.ja: “オレたち”の沼？

translation.en: You know, when we're through rescuing the princess and all that stuff.
translation.ja: オレたち 姫を助けたろ？

translation.en: We? Donkey, there's no "we." There's no "our."
translation.ja: オレたち？ オレたちって誰？

translation.en: There's just me and my swamp.
translation.ja: あれは この上の沼だ

translation.en: The first thing I'm gonna do is build a ten-foot wall around my land.
translation.ja: 沼が戻ったら まず高い壁で囲む

translation.en: You cut me deep, Shrek. You cut me real deep just now.
translation.ja: 傷ついたぜ メチャ傷ついた

translation.en: You know what I think? I think this whole wall thing is just a way to keep somebody out.
translation.ja: “壁”をめぐらせて 誰も近づけないってわけか

translation.en: -No, do ya think? -Are you hidin' something?
translation.ja: 鋭いな さすがだ 悩みでも？

translation.en: Never mind, Donkey.
translation.ja: ほっといてくれ

translation.en: Oh, this is another one of those onion things, isn't it?
translation.ja: また例の玉ネギと関係あり？

translation.en: No, this is one of those drop-it and leave-it-alone things.
translation.ja: うるさいんだよ もう構うなって！

translation.en: -Why don't you want to talk about it? -Why do you want to talk about it?
translation.ja: 話せば 何を話すのさ？

translation.en: Why are you blocking? I'm not blocking.
translation.ja: 隠してる 隠してないよ

translation.en: Oh, yes, you are. Donkey, I'm warning you.
translation.ja: しつこいぞ！

translation.en: -Who you trying to keep out? -Everyone! Okay?
translation.ja: 誰を近づけたくないの？ 皆だよ！

translation.en: Oh, now we're gettin' somewhere.
translation.ja: それで読めてきた

translation.en: Oh! For the love of Pete!
translation.ja: 勘弁してくれ！

translation.en: What's your problem? What you got against the whole world anyway, huh?
translation.ja: なぜ世間を避けてるんだ？

translation.en: Look, I'm not the one with the problem, okay? It's the world that seems to have a problem with me.
translation.ja: オレは避けてない 世間が オレを避けるんだよ

translation.en: People take one look at me and go, "Aah! Help! Run!
translation.ja: オレを見ると “助けて！ 逃げろ！”

translation.en: A big, stupid, ugly ogre!"
translation.ja: “デカくて醜い怪物だ”って

translation.en: [sighs] They judge me before they even know me.
translation.ja: オレのことを知りもせず…

translation.en: That's why I'm better off alone.
translation.ja: 独りの方がいい

translation.en: You know what? When we met, I didn't think you was just a big, stupid, ugly ogre.
translation.ja: オレは“デカくて 醜い怪物だ” なんて思ってない

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: So, uh, are there any donkeys up there?
translation.ja: ロバの星座もあるのかな？

translation.en: Well, there's, um, Gabby,
translation.ja: あるとも “うるさい座”

translation.en: the Small and Annoying.
translation.ja: “お節介なロバ座”

translation.en: Okay, okay, I see it now, yeah. The big shiny one, right there. That one there?
translation.ja: 分かった あれだろ？ 大きく光ってるやつ

translation.en: -That's the moon. -Oh, okay.
translation.ja: あれは月だ そっか

translation.en: [Farquaad] Again. Show me again.
translation.ja: もう一度 見よう

translation.en: Mirror, mirror, show her to me. Show me the princess.
translation.ja: 鏡よ 鏡 もう一度 プリンセスを！

translation.en: Ah. Perfect. [inhales]
translation.ja: パーフェクトだ！

translation.en: [Donkey] Mmm, yeah, you know I like it like that.
translation.ja: そこ最高ン…

translation.en: -Come on, baby. I said I like it. -Donkey, wake up.
translation.ja: 乗ってガバッと ドンキー 起きろ

translation.en: -Huh? What? -Wake up.
translation.ja: 起きろ

translation.en: -What? -[Fiona] Good morning.
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: Um, how do you like your eggs?
translation.ja: 玉子食べる？

translation.en: -Good morning, Princess! -What's all this about?
translation.ja: おはよう プリンセス でも なぜ？

translation.en: You know, we kind of got off to a bad start yesterday and...
translation.ja: 私たち 出だしがマズかったわ

translation.en: I wanted to make it up to you.
translation.ja: だから仲直りをしたいの

translation.en: I mean, after all, you did rescue me.
translation.ja: だから仲直りをしたいの 命の恩人だし…

translation.en: -Uh, thanks. -[sniffs]
translation.ja: そうか うれしいね

translation.en: Well, eat up. We've got a big day ahead of us.
translation.ja: 食べて 今日は大事な１日よ

translation.en: -[belches] -Shrek!
translation.ja: シュレック！

translation.en: What? It's a compliment.
translation.ja: ごちそうの礼だよ

translation.en: Better out than in, I always say. [laughs]
translation.ja: “出るものは拒まず”だ

translation.en: Well, it's no way to behave in front of a princess.
translation.ja: プリンセスの前で行儀悪い！

translation.en: -Thanks. -She's as nasty as you are.
translation.ja: 失礼 プリンセスも！

translation.en: You know, you're not exactly what I expected.
translation.ja: 思ってたイメージと ちょっと違うな

translation.en: Well, maybe you shouldn't judge people before you get to know them.
translation.ja: 人を見かけで判断しないで

translation.en: [man] La liberte! Hey!
translation.ja: ブラボー！ 自由よ！

translation.en: Princess!
translation.ja: プリンセス！

translation.en: -[laughs] -What are you doing?
translation.ja: やめて 何する気？

translation.en: Be still, mon cherie, for I am your saviour!
translation.ja: キミを助けてやる モナムール！

translation.en: And I am rescuing you from this green-- [kissing sounds]
translation.ja: その薄汚いグリーンの

translation.en: -beast. -[Shrek] Hey!
translation.ja: 野獣から プリンセスに手を出すな！

translation.en: That's my princess! Go find your own!
translation.ja: プリンセスに手を出すな！

translation.en: Please, monster! Can't you see I'm a little busy here?
translation.ja: おい野獣！ 取り込み中だぞ

translation.en: Look, pal, I don't know who you think you are!
translation.ja: いったい何様のつもり？

translation.en: Oh! Of course! Oh, how rude. Please let me introduce myself.

translation.en: Ah, that is so sweet. You don't have to waste good manners on the ogre.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's not like it has feelings.
translation.ja: 通じぬ相手だがね

translation.en: No, you're right. It doesn't.
translation.ja: そう そういう相手ですわ

translation.en: Princess Fiona, beautiful, fair, flawless Fiona.
translation.ja: 美しく 気高い フィオナ姫よ

translation.en: -I ask your hand in marriage. -[gasps]
translation.ja: 私の妃になって下さい

translation.en: Will you be the perfect bride for the perfect groom?

translation.en: Lord Farquaad, I accept. Nothing would make--

translation.en: Excellent! I'll start the plans, for tomorrow we wed!

translation.en: No! I mean, uh,
translation.ja: ダメよ！ 明日まで待つの？

translation.en: why wait?
translation.ja: 明日まで待つの？

translation.en: Let's get married today before the sun sets.

translation.en: Oh, anxious, are we? You're right.

translation.en: The sooner, the better. There's so much to do!
translation.ja: 確かに 早く準備を！

translation.en: There's the caterer, the cake, the band, the guest list. Captain, round up some guests!

translation.en: [Fiona] Fare-thee-well, ogre.

translation.en: Shrek, what are you doing? You're letting her get away.

translation.en: Yeah? So what?

translation.en: Shrek, there's something about her you don't know. Look, I talked to her last night. She's--

translation.en: I know you talked to her last night. You're great pals, aren't ya?

translation.en: Now, if you two are such good friends, why don't you follow her home?

translation.en: Shrek, I-- I wanna go with you.

translation.en: I told you, didn't I? You're not coming home with me.

translation.en: I live alone! My swamp! Me! Nobody else!
translation.ja: オレは沼で独りで暮らす！ 独りっきりでな！ いいな！

translation.en: Understand? Nobody!

translation.en: Especially useless, pathetic, annoying, talking donkeys!

translation.en: -But I thought-- -Yeah. You know what?
translation.ja: でも… 分かっただろ？ 消えてくれ！

translation.en: You thought wrong!
translation.ja: 分かっただろ？ 消えてくれ！

translation.en: Shrek.
translation.ja: シュレック

translation.en: Donkey?
translation.ja: ドンキー？

translation.en: -[grunts] -What are you doing?

translation.en: I would think, of all people, you would recognize a wall when you see one.
translation.ja: あんたに壁が分からんのか？

translation.en: Well, yeah. But the wall's supposed to go around my swamp, not through it.
translation.ja: 壁は沼の周りに作るんだ 真ん中を通るんじゃない

translation.en: It is around your half. See, that's your half, and this is my half.
translation.ja: あんたとオレの土地の境界さ

translation.en: Oh! Your half. Hmm.
translation.ja: そっちは お前の土地？

translation.en: Yes, my half. I helped rescue the princess. I did half the work, I get half the booty.

translation.en: Now hand me that big old rock, the one that looks like your head.

translation.en: -Back off! -No, you back off.
translation.ja: 下がれ！ お前こそ！

translation.en: -This is my swamp! -Our swamp.

translation.en: -Let go, Donkey! -You let go.

translation.en: -Stubborn jackass! -Smelly ogre.
translation.ja: 放せ！ 分からず屋！ 怪物！

translation.en: Fine!
translation.ja: そうか！

translation.en: Hey, come back here. I'm not through with you yet.

translation.en: Well, I'm through with you.

translation.en: Uh-uh. You know, with you it's always, "Me, me, me!"

translation.en: Well, guess what! Now it's my turn!

translation.en: So you just shut up and pay attention!

translation.en: You are mean to me. You insult me and you don't appreciate anything that I do!

translation.en: You're always pushing me around or pushing me away.

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Well, if I treated you so bad, how come you came back?

translation.en: Because that's what friends do! They forgive each other!

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You're right, Donkey.

translation.en: I forgive you... for stabbin' me in the back!

translation.en: Ohh! You're so wrapped up in layers, onion boy, you're afraid of your own feelings.

translation.en: -Go away! -See! There you are, doing it again,

translation.en: just like you did to Fiona. All she ever do was like you, maybe even love you.

translation.en: I heard the two of you talking.

translation.en: She wasn't talkin' about you.

translation.en: She was talkin' about, uh, somebody else.

translation.en: She wasn't talking about me?

translation.en: Well, then who was she talking about?

translation.en: Uh-uh, no way. I ain't saying anything. You don't wanna listen to me.

translation.en: -Right? Right? -Donkey!

translation.en: -No! -Okay, look.
translation.ja: ヤだ！ 分かった 謝るよ 悪かった

translation.en: I'm sorry, all right?

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 悪かった

translation.en: I guess I am just a big, stupid, ugly ogre.
translation.ja: オレは やっぱ デカくて醜い怪物だ

translation.en: Can you forgive me?

translation.en: Hey, that's what friends are for, right?
translation.ja: ああ それが友達さ

translation.en: Right. Friends?

translation.en: So, um,
translation.ja: 彼女は

translation.en: what did Fiona say about me?

translation.en: What are you asking me for? Why don't you just go ask her?

translation.en: The wedding! We'll never make it in time.

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha! Never fear, for where there's a will, there's a way, and I have a way. [whistles]

translation.en: -Donkey? -[Donkey laughing]

translation.en: I guess it's just my animal magnetism.

translation.en: [laughing] Aw, come here, you.

translation.en: All right, all right. Don't get all slobbery. No one likes a kiss ass.

translation.en: All right, hop on and hold on tight.

translation.en: I haven't had a chance to install the seat belts yet.

translation.en: People of DuLoc,
translation.ja: デュロックの市民よ “静粛に”

translation.en: we gather here today,

translation.en: to bear witness, -to the union... -Um--

translation.en: -...of our new king-- -Excuse me. -Could we just skip ahead to the "I do's"? -[chuckling]

translation.en: Go on.

translation.en: Go ahead, have some fun. If we need you, I'll whistle. How about that?

translation.en: Shrek, wait, wait! Wait a minute!

translation.en: -You wanna do this right, don't you? -What are you talking about?

translation.en: There's a line, there's a line you gotta wait for. The preacher's gonna say, "Speak now or forever hold your peace."

translation.en: -That's when you say, "I object!" -I don't have time for this!

translation.en: Wait. What are you doing? Listen to me!

translation.en: -Look, you love this woman, don't you? -Yes.

translation.en: -You wanna hold her? -Yes.
translation.ja: 抱きしめて

translation.en: -Please her? -Yes!

translation.en: ♪ Then you got to got to Try a little tenderness ♪

translation.en: -The chicks love that romantic crap! -All right! Cut it out.

translation.en: -When does this guy say the line? -We gotta check it out.

translation.en: -[Shrek] What do you see? -The whole town's in there.

translation.en: -I now pronounce you husband and wife-- -They're at the altar.

translation.en: -King and queen... -Mother Fletcher! He already said it.

translation.en: -Oh, for the love of Pete! -[grunts]

translation.en: I object!

translation.en: -Shrek? -[gasps]

translation.en: Oh, now what does he want?

translation.en: Hi, everyone. Havin' a good time, are ya?

translation.en: [laughs] I love DuLoc, first of all.
translation.ja: 清潔な いい街だ

translation.en: -Very clean. -What are you doing here?

translation.en: Really, it's rude enough being alive when no one wants you,

translation.en: -but showing up uninvited to a wedding-- -Fiona!

translation.en: -I need to talk to you. -Oh, now you wanna talk?

translation.en: Well, It's a little late for that, so if you'll excuse me--

translation.en: -But you can't marry him. -And why not?

translation.en: Because-- Because he's just marrying you so he can be king.

translation.en: Outrageous! Fiona, don't listen to him.

translation.en: -He's not your true love. -And what do you know about true love?

translation.en: Well, I-- Uh--

translation.en: -I mean-- -Oh, this is precious.
translation.ja: こいつは大笑いだ

translation.en: [chuckling] The ogre has fallen in love with the princess!

translation.en: -Oh, good Lord. -[crowd laughing]
translation.ja: “静粛に” “一同 笑う”

translation.en: An ogre and a princess!
translation.ja: 怪物とプリンセス！

translation.en: Shrek, is this true?

translation.en: Who cares? It's preposterous!

translation.en: Fiona, my love, we're but a kiss away from our "happily ever after."

translation.en: Now kiss me! Mmmm!
translation.ja: キスを！

translation.en: "By night one way, by day another."
translation.ja: “夜と昼で” “別人になる私”

translation.en: I wanted to show you before.

translation.en: Well, uh,

translation.en: that explains a lot.

translation.en: [Farquaad] Ugh! It's disgusting!

translation.en: Guards! Guards!

translation.en: I order you to get that out of my sight now! Get them!

translation.en: -Get them both! -No, no!
translation.ja: こんな茶番に潰されたくない！ とにかく私は

translation.en: This hocus-pocus alters nothing.
translation.ja: とにかく私は

translation.en: This marriage is binding, and that makes me king! -See? See? -No, let go of me! Shrek!
translation.ja: これで王になった 私は王だ！

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: ジャマだ！

translation.en: [Farquaad] Don't just-stand there, you morons.
translation.ja: ジャマだ！ 放せ！

translation.en: Get out of my way! Fiona!

translation.en: Arrgh!
translation.ja: この化け物め！

translation.en: [Farquaad] I'll make you regret the day we met. I'll see you drawn and quartered!

translation.en: -You'll beg for death to save you! -No! Shrek!

translation.en: -And as for you, my wife, -Fiona!

translation.en: I'll have you locked back in that tower for the rest of your days!
translation.ja: 一生 城の塔に 幽閉してやる！

translation.en: -I am king! -[whistles] I will have order! I will have perfection! I will have--

translation.en: -Aah! All right. -Nobody move. I got a dragon here, and I'm not afraid to use it.
translation.ja: 動くな！ オレを甘く見るなよ！

translation.en: -[dragon roars] -I'm a donkey on the edge!
translation.ja: 逆ギレのドンキーだ！

translation.en: Celebrity marriages. They never last, do they?
translation.ja: 有名人の結婚って短命だ

translation.en: Go ahead, Shrek.
translation.ja: 出番だ

translation.en: Uh, Fiona?
translation.ja: フィオナ

translation.en: Yes, Shrek?
translation.ja: シュレック

translation.en: I-- I love you.
translation.ja: 君を 愛してる

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: Really, really.
translation.ja: ホントにホント

translation.en: I love you too.
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: [Fiona's voice] "Until you find true love's first kiss...
translation.ja: 運命の人の最初のキスで

translation.en: [echoing] ...and then take love's true form."
translation.ja: 私は真の姿を現す 私は真の姿を現す

translation.en: Fiona?
translation.ja: フィオナ？

translation.en: Fiona.
translation.ja: フィオナ

translation.en: Are you all right?
translation.ja: 大丈夫かい？

translation.en: Well, yes.
translation.ja: ええ 大丈夫

translation.en: But I don't understand.
translation.ja: でもヘンだわ

translation.en: I'm supposed to be beautiful.
translation.ja: 美しくなるはずなのに

translation.en: But you are beautiful.
translation.ja: とても美しいよ

translation.en: I was hoping this would be a happy ending.
translation.ja: ハッピー･エンドなのに涙が…

translation.en: God bless us, every one.
translation.ja: すべての人に神の祝福を！

translation.en: ♪ Come on, y'all! Then I saw her face, ha-ha! ♪
translation.ja: 皆 一緒に

translation.en: ♪ I believe ♪
translation.ja: “２人は いつまでも 醜く暮らしました”

translation.en: Oh, that's funny. Oh. Oh.
translation.ja: 面白～い！

translation.en: [Donkey] I can't breathe. I can't breathe.
translation.ja: 面白すぎて息 つまりそう…
